Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Attack    X is your Influence    Y is your Attack Value
Top Ability Rules: Consume an Attack Token. Disperse (X + Y) damage amoung Targets in a 10 foot by 10 foot area.
Bottom Ability Rules: On success The target takes X damage and reduces Defense and Attack Values by X.

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card. Target Ally may play an additional Ability in place of this Action.
Bottom Ability Rules: Target may play an additional turn in place of this action. Skip your next turn.

Top Ability Rules: Reduce the next instance of damage you would take from an Enemy Attack to 0.
Bottom Ability Rules: reduce all damage dealt to you by X.

Top Ability Rules: On success the Target rolls their next value twice and then takes the lower sum of the two.
Bottom Ability Rules: The Target rolls their next value twice and then takes the higher sum of the two.

Top Ability Rules: If your attack deals damage to the Target then their next Defense Value against you is 0.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Reduce your next Defence Value by Y
Bottom Ability Rules: If the next Attack against you deals damage then the attacker takes (Y * X) damage.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y is (X * 5)
Top Ability Rules: Discard a card. Lay down spikes on a 1 by Y space adjacent to you. Whenever an enemy walks through or stops on a square with these spikes they take X damage.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level * 5   Y is your Influence
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. Throw your trap on a space within X feet. You may activate it at anytime. When it is activated it explodes dealing Y damage to any being on that space or a space adjacent to it.

Top Ability Rules: Target plays an additional Top Action in place of this action. Return a card from discard to your hand.
Bottom Ability Rules: You and the Target return up to X cards from discard and heal up to X life.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Influence    X is the number of cards in your Hand
Top Ability Rules: If you succeed the Target takes X damage.
Bottom Ability Rules: If you succeed then roll Influence and the Target takes that Influence Value in damage. You may exhaust a card from your deck and replay this action.

Top Ability Rules: Choose an action from a card in your hand and play its Action in place of this Action.
Bottom Ability Rules: You may play the Top and Bottom Action of a card you played earlier this turn in place of this Action.

Top Ability Rules: Whenever the Target takes an action you may Attack that Target.
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack the Target with an Unarmed Attack. If the Target took damage from your attack then they can only take Movement Actions on their next turn.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Influence    Y is your Level
Top Ability Rules: Consume an Attack Token. Choose a 5 x 5 foot space within 30 feet of you. Any being on that space takes X damage. If a being starts their turn while on that space they take X damage.
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y is your Influence
Bottom Ability Rules: Consume a Defense Token. Exhaust a card. Whenever an Enemy makes an attack against you they take Y damage.

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed and the Target is Marked then you may make an attack against that Target. They cannot roll defense for that attack. Remove the Mark on that Target.
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark the  Target. If you succeed then return this card to your Hand.

Top Ability Rules: If the Target makes an attack against you and they are farther than 10 feet away then add X to your Defense Rolls.
Bottom Ability Rules: If your attack dealt damage to the Target then the Target is pushed back 15 feet away from you. If your Influence roll succeeded then other Enemies withing 5 feet of the Target are also pushed back 15 feet away from you.

Top Ability Rules: If you have seen the Target that day then you can see them and their immediate surroundings. You can tell the general direction they are from you.
Bottom Ability Rules: You gain knowledge of the locations of all Enemies in a 30 feet area around you.

Top Ability Rules: Add you Influence to your Defense Rolls.
Bottom Ability Rules: On success add your Influence to Attack Values you make against that Target.

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Influence    Y is your Influence * 5
Top Ability Rules: Create an area within Influence Range that is 5 by Y feet. If an Enemy makes an attack while being in that area they reduce their Attack Value by X.
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose a 5 by 5 foot area within your Attack Range. Make an attack against each enemy within X feet of that area.

Top Ability Rules: Lose X Health, target heals up to X life
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y is your Influence
Bottom Ability Rules: All allies within 15 ft of your area heal for X on their turn

Top Ability Rules: Throw a mine to a spot within 20 feet. Any enemy movement on or in adjacent 5 feet of spot results in 2d6 damage
Bottom Ability Rules: In adjacent space create 3 consumable items. These items last up to X rounds and heal for up to X health.

Top Ability Rules: Target all enemies within 10 feet of you with influence roll. On success, deal 1d6 damage per target
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Level    Y is your Influence
Bottom Ability Rules: Create a barrier around yourself. If attacked, dispense Y damage to attacker

Top Ability Rules: Attack 2 enemies that are adjacent to each other
Bottom Ability Rules: After the attack, your next 10 feet of movement leaves behind an aura of damage. Passing on or through any of these 5ft. squares results in 1d4 damage

Top Ability Rules:
Gain 20 feet of movement. Double all movement this turn.
you may consume a defense token to instead put this in your hand
Bottom Ability Rules: After calculating the damage, determine if doubling the damage would be enough to kill the target. If so, kill the target. else, do no damage

Top Ability Rules: On success, reduce target movement by 10 ft. You may consume a defense token to reduce it by an addition 10 ft.
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose a 5 x 10 ft. area in range. All in area defend against X damage. You may consume an attack token to increase area of effect to 5x20

Top Ability Rules: Heal target for X. you may consume a defense token to double healing
Bottom Ability Rules: If target is marked, heal for X and then remove that mark

Top Ability Rules: For each enemy that targets you with an attack, mark that enemy
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain 15 ft. movement. If target is marked, they are forced to mimic your movement

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt you may consume one Influence Token to return 1 card from discard and heal for X
Bottom Ability Rules: When enemy moves, you may roll opposing Influence. On success, consume an influence token to stop their movement

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, enemy takes 1d4 damage at the start of your next turn. If attack token is consumed, damage persists for X additional rounds
Bottom Ability Rules: Copy ability from an exhausted card, and use that ability in place of this ability

Top Ability Rules: Ally may discard one card and heal for X
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, determine which ally an enemy can target next turn

Top Ability Rules: Gain X summons (1 HP, 1d4 unblockable attack, 15 ft movement with flight)
Bottom Ability Rules: If downed, you may immediately play action. Gain X summons (1 HP, 2d4 attack, 5 ft movement)

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler:
X is your Level
Y = rounds kept in stasis * X
Top Ability Rules: Your ally may play this card in their stasis slot, or use it immediately. This card may be consumed and returned to your discard pile, granting the ally Y health and an extra action
Bottom Ability Rules: Reduce your health by X to apply buff to Ally. If Ally is downed in next round, they instead set their health to X

Top Ability Rules: Remove defense token on target to reduce their attack values by X
Bottom Ability Rules: If you defend against target's attack, consume a defense token to attack them back. Target does not roll defense

Top Ability Rules: Reduce your next defense value by X to return all player's contact tokens from target
Bottom Ability Rules: Remove defense token on target to prevent an overstep attack

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, reduce targets next attack by X
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: Attack    X is your Level    Y = X/2
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, you may consume an attack token. Target's defense is lowered by Y and movement reduced by 10 ft for X rounds

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, consume an attack token and attack another target in range. If damage is dealt, attack another new target in range. repeat until an attack doesn't deal damage, or all targets in range are dealt damage
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, you may consume an attack token. Target's Influence is lowered by X

Top Ability Rules: Reduce your next defense value by up to X and grant it to an ally
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain X health

Top Ability Rules: Gain 20 ft of movement. In a continuous path of length 15 ft you move through this turn, create an area of a damaging effect which deals Xd4 damage for each 5ft movement into, out of, or through it
Bottom Ability Rules: Produce up to X consumables. These can be thrown up to 15 feet, and attack for 3d6 damage

Top Ability Rules: Create a band between yourself and an ally up to 10 feet. All who exist in this band take 1d6 damage, undefended
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose an adjacent ally. They may increase their attack and defense by 1d4

Top Ability Rules: Upon success, target cannot target you with any actions directly. You may consume an influence token to prevent target from targeting an additional ally directly
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, target cannot take actions and takes 1d4 damage each round. They must succeed another Influence contest to break free

Top Ability Rules: Choose a circular area of diameter 15 feet. No sounds enter or leave from this area
Bottom Ability Rules: 10 seconds of sounds can be stored in any object up to 1 ft sq in size. Information can be recalled at will, or with a passphrase spoken, within influence range

Top Ability Rules: On success, consume an attack token. Target takes 2d4 damage and has -2 to all rolls
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, consume an attack token. Target takes 1d6 damage and catches fire, taking this damage every turn until they spend an action to put it out.

Top Ability Rules: Target gains X temporary hit points. you may consume an influence token to also increase their defense for 1 round by X
Bottom Ability Rules: Ally may return 3 cards from discard

Top Ability Rules: Gain 20 ft. movement. You may consume a mark within range to gain an additional 20 ft.
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, target's movement is reduced by 10 ft. for X Rounds. You may discard a card to mark the target as well

Top Ability Rules: For all adjacent allies, if they take damage, you take that damage instead and reduce it by X
Bottom Ability Die Roll/Scaler: X is your Influence    Y is your Level
Bottom Ability Rules: Heal Target Ally for Y and lose X life
